speaker: ABBY
text: Vegas, baby. I love Las Vegas.

Oh.

to bring me down and to make me lose my cool,
when Kelly you showed up in Orlando.
And I was sitting in a seat watching the competition.

You wouldn't have made a spectacle

- Well, you did. - No, you did.

Abby Lee Dance Company. It's all about me.

and reacting to you and reacting to--
And what I'm telling you is--
--all the idiots in the world.
And I'm a professional and I will remain a professional.
And that's the way it goes.

You were fourth.

there are consequences for your actions
